original_title: I Am Legend: Awakening - Story 4: Death is a Gift
overview: This is one of the four "animated comics" taking place in the same universe as the film "I Am Legend".  In Hong Kong, China, Jinghua Xu sits in her apartment at dawn, writing a note. She then leaves her apartment building, and goes out into the desolate ruins of a lifeless Hong Kong.
title: I Am Legend: Awakening - Story 4: Death is a Gift
